titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an Rush Rhees, [5. 4. 1940]
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original an der Ã–NB (Autogr. 1286/16-5); Kopie im BA. Publiziert (WiC, S. 321).

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: I got your letter here. I'll be back in Cambr. tonight. Was very glad to hear from you. I like the idea of your doing work in a factory. You'll get better & better I have no doubt, if you can stick. Best wishes to both of you. I hope to see you before long.
